boardgame.name: Genoa
Genua
Die Händler von Genua
Los mercaderes de Génova
Mercaderes de Génova
The Traders of Genoa
boardgame.description: In Genoa (originally published as The Traders of Genoa), players take the part of Renaissance traders, moving about the city acquiring goods and filling orders for goods. Messages need to be delivered and privileges obtained. Of course, none of this can be accomplished on one's own. Much negotiation and deal-making is the order of the day in an effort to become the richest deal-maker in Genoa. Flexible rules allow for negotiating almost everything in the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Traders of Genoa version of this game is #6 in the Alea big box series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Filosofia - Genoa Language: English Players: 3 to 5 Age: 10+ Duration: about 60 min Weight: 1.450 kg New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Theme: You are a trader in the city of Genoa. The game board depicts the neighbourhood where all the trading takes place. You try to acquire prestige in the buildings with a banner. These buildings let you do different actions that will lead you to your goal. Each turn you can only do one action. You will try to sell the other available actions to the other players for maximum profit. With sneaky strategies and smart negotiations, you try to earn more than your opponents and thus end up being the winner. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Traders of Genoa - Rio Grande Games English language version of the Alea Big Box series (not the newer printing titled Genoa). Complete and in excellent condition. Played once. From a non-smoking home. You pay all shipping charges. For domestic shipping, this game can be shipped inside a medium Priority Mail flat rate box for $11.00. This method also does not include insurance, which can be added for $1.75. I cannot be responsible for lost or damaged shipments if you do not purchase insurance. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship by another method if you prefer. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to combine shipping for multiple items. Use zip code 98104 to calculate shipping costs. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also happy to arrange for local pickup in the Seattle-Tacoma-Olympia area. I will ship anywhere, by your choice of carrier, however there is a $10 surcharge per international shipments above the cost of shipping to compensate me for the additional time involved in shipping internationally. Note that this is per shipment, so if you buy several games from me and have them shipped together, you just pay once. Sorry to have to do this, but international shipments are much more time consuming for me than domestic shipments. Payment by PayPal only, except for local pickup which must be paid in cash. Sorry, no checks or money orders. I will ship within 3 days of receipt of payment.
